New Records: Nedim Bajrami scored the fastest goal in European Championship history
Pre-Game Insights: Albania cannot afford to lose again on Wednesday, when they meet Group B rivals Croatia in Hamburg.
Sylvinho will consider making changes to the XI that lined up against Italy last time out.
Winger Jasir Asani - a key player in qualifying - has recovered from an ankle injury and may still start in the final third.
Arber Hoxha could be called upon to deputise against some familiar faces; Besiktas forward Ernest Muci is another contender.
Rey Manaj is also vying for promotion from the bench, after Chelsea's Armando Broja failed to make much of an impact in Dortmund.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Berat Djimsiti captains the Eagles from central defence.
Albania possible starting lineup: Strakosha; Hysaj, Ismajli, Djimsiti, Mitaj; Asllani, Ramadani; Laci, Bajrami, Asani; Broja
Others: The match will take place on June 19, 2024, at 2pm UK at the Volksparkstadion.
